title: Innovative Irrigation How SpaceX is Growing

tasks.task: Design and implement an irrigation system for crops on Mars considering low gravity.
subtasks: Understand water behavior under 38% Earth gravity.
Ensure precise water delivery to plant roots.
Prevent soil flooding and water evaporation.
Develop a drip irrigation system for targeted watering.
Create a closed-loop water recycling system.
Filter and reuse water to maximize efficiency.
